characters.name: Mrs. Henderson
characters.description: Mrs. Henderson is the friendly librarian who loves helping others find books. She is knowledgeable about flowers and photography.

dialogues.message: Welcome to the library! How can I assist you today?
If you're interested in flowers, I have just the book for you! It's a fantastic guide.
Oh, you need a battery for your camera? Let's find it together!
Don't hesitate to come back if you need more help!
